rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu by aligning the entrance with the main entrance road and incorporating natural lighting.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: Combines modern design elements with efficient space utilization. Features an open layout for enhanced family interaction, ensuring a north-eastern orientation to benefit from sunlight and positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Studio Apartment (Duplex)
rooms.description: A versatile living space that merges residential comfort with contemporary design principles. Equipped with flexible partitioning to accommodate the joint family's needs while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Adjacent to the main living areas, designed for convenience and efficient access. Incorporates basic amenities, ensuring alignment with local building norms and Vastu principles for a positive energy flow.

openings.description: Aligned to harness positive energy as per Vastu Shastra, ensuring smooth transition into the living space.

details.description: Facilitates natural ventilation and light throughout the open-plan area, in accordance with local design norms.

openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace. The terrace is designed as an extension of living space for relaxation and family gatherings.

additional_features.name: Irregular Plot Adaptation
additional_features.description: The design utilizes irregular plot geometry by incorporating curved partitions and flexible room layouts that complement natural contours, ensuring maximum utilization of available space while respecting local building regulations.

additional_features.name: Duplex Studio Apartment
additional_features.description: A multi-level design that offers flexibility for joint family living. The design integrates contemporary aesthetic with functional spaces to accommodate the diverse needs of a joint family setup.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: An outdoor living space that provides scenic views and serves as an additional recreational area, designed with safety railings and accessible paths in accordance with local building codes.
